name: mods
description: An executable wrapper to compile standalone scripts and modules into a single tool.
author: Tom√°s Luchesi <no.mad.devtech@gmail.com>

scripts.build-debug: pkg --debug -c package.json -t node18-win mods.js > build.log && echo. && echo Run with "set DEBUG_PKG=1 & mods.exe"
scripts.git-commits:
git log --pretty="format:## `%s`%n%n> Commit: %H%n%n> Author: %an <%ae>%n%n> Date: %ai%n%n```%n%B```%n%n
%n" > COMMITS.md
scripts.git-logs: git log --format="%h%x09%ai%x09%an%x09%s" | mods.exe tee COMMITS.log | mods.exe echo "Hash\tDate\tAuthor\tSubject" - | mods.exe head -n 11 | mods.exe echo - "...\t...\t...\t..." | mods.exe csv -s \t
